title: Come Back Home

tokens.lyric: There's a man I've read about, and they say he lives forever,

lines.raw: [D]There's a man I've read about, and they say he lives forever,

tokens.lyric: When this world was full of doubt

lines.raw: [G]When this world was full of doubt

tokens.lyric: He came and brought the world together.

lines.raw: [D]He came and brought the world together.

tokens.lyric: Then he left us on our own,

lines.raw: [A7]Then he left us on our own,

tokens.lyric: And it's time again for him to come back home.

lines.raw: [G]And it's time again for him to come back home.

tokens.lyric: Come back home, make the streams flow to the valleys,

lines.raw: [A7]Come back home, make the streams flow to the valleys,

tokens.lyric: And take away the clouds that hide the sun.

lines.raw: [D]And take away the clouds that hide the sun.

tokens.lyric: Come back home, teach each man to love his neighbor,

lines.raw: [G]Come back home, teach each man to love his neighbor,

tokens.lyric: And give us one more chance to right the wrongs we've done.

lines.raw: [F#m]And give us one more chance to right the wrongs we've done.

tokens.lyric: If only for the children come back home.

lines.raw: [Em]If only for the children come back home.

tokens.lyric: You gave us trees, we've cut them down

lines.raw: [C]You gave us trees, we've cut them down

tokens.lyric: Skies of blue, we've made them hazy

lines.raw: [A7]Skies of blue, we've made them hazy

tokens.lyric: The lakes and streams are dark and cold

lines.raw: [D]The lakes and streams are dark and cold

tokens.lyric: And it's time again for him to come back home

lines.raw: [Bm]And it's time again for him to come back home

tokens.lyric: Cause our time is running out
And the world is slowly dying
The things we've done have all gone wrong

lines.raw: [D]The things we've done have all gone wrong

tokens.lyric: And it's time again for him to come back home

lines.raw: [G]And it's time again for him to come back home

source:
{title: Come Back Home}
{key: D}

{section: Verse 1}
[D]There's a man I've read about, and they say he lives forever,
[G]When this world was full of doubt
[D]He came and brought the world together.
[A7]Then he left us on our own,
[G]And it's time again for him to come back home.

{section: Chorus}
[A7]Come back home, make the streams flow to the valleys,
[D]And take away the clouds that hide the sun.
[G]Come back home, teach each man to love his neighbor,
[F#m]And give us one more chance to right the wrongs we've done.
[Em]If only for the children come back home.

{section: Verse 2}
[C]You gave us trees, we've cut them down
[A7]Skies of blue, we've made them hazy
[D]The lakes and streams are dark and cold
[Bm]And it's time again for him to come back home

{section: Verse 3}
[G]Cause our time is running out
[A7]And the world is slowly dying
[D]The things we've done have all gone wrong
[G]And it's time again for him to come back home
